```{r setup, include=FALSE}

                      message =FALSE, cache = TRUE, fig.width =12, 
                      fig.height = 8)
library(knitr)
library(rgeos)
library(rgdal)
library(raster)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gtable)
library(grid)
library(stringr)
library(data.table)
library(viridis)
# Función para referencia de entradas 
fig <- local({
    i <- 0
    ref <- list()
    list(
        cap=function(refName, text) {
            i <<- i + 1
            ref[[refName]] <<- i
            paste("Figure ", i, ": ", text, sep="")
        },
        ref=function(refName) {
            ref[[refName]]
        })
})
``` 
